channel.title: Sesamum Indicum on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Sesamum Indicum on funPlantGenes

item.title: SiNAC1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Sindi_2309500 Gene Symbol: SiNAC1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Sesamum indicum Functional Description: A GWAS of 560 57 sesame accessions combined with an overexpression study confirmed NAC1 and PPO 58 genes play an important role in oil content upregulation in sesame.

item.title: SiPPO
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Sindi_2087700 Gene Symbol: SiPPO Gene Name: Genome: Species: Sesamum indicum Functional Description: A GWAS of 560 57 sesame accessions combined with an overexpression study confirmed NAC1 and PPO 58 genes play an important role in oil content upregulation in sesame.

item.title: SiRLK1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Sindi_0812400 Gene Symbol: SiRLK1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Sesamum indicum Functional Descriptions: A marker S3_21381019 developed based on the variation within the SiRLK1 locus will facilitate marker-assisted breeding for the improvement of sesame disease resistance.
